meanings.definition: Something that blocks the way such as a fence or wall.
examples: The cement barrier stopped people from walking into traffic.

images.description: A person is trying to climb over the brick wall.
images.caption: The wall is a barrier that blocks this person from easily going over it.

source.title: Faceless male tracer climbing brick fence in park
source.author: Mary Taylor

meanings.definition: Something that blocks the way such as a fence or wall.
examples: The wall was an impediment that stopped people from walking into traffic.

images.description: A person is trying to climb over the brick wall.
images.caption: The wall is an impediment that blocks this person from easily going over it.

source.title: Faceless male tracer climbing brick fence in park
source.author: Mary Taylor

meanings.definition: To come upon after losing something and searching for it.

images.alt: Photo of a father and daughter reading a book.
images.description: A father and daughter reading a book.
images.caption: This child is finding hidden objects in this popup book.

source.title: Dad and Daughter Reading a Cutouts Fairy Tale Book
source.author: cottonbro

meanings.definition: To come upon after losing something and searching for it.

images.alt: Photo of a father and daughter reading a book.
images.description: A father and daughter reading a book.
images.caption: This child recovers objects her father has hidden in the book.

source.title: Dad and Daughter Reading a Cutouts Fairy Tale Book
source.author: cottonbro

meanings.definition: To make improve, to make better.
examples: The team polished their soccer skills at every practice.

images.alt: Photo of a person bouncing a soccer ball on his head.
images.description: A person bouncing a soccer ball on his head.
images.caption: Polishing your skills helps you get better at whatever you want to do.

source.title: Adult happy sportsman hitting ball with head
source.author: Yogendra Singh

meanings.definition: To make improve, to make better.
examples: The team refined their soccer skills at every practice.

images.alt: Photo of a person bouncing a soccer ball on his head.
images.description: A person bouncing a soccer ball on his head.
images.caption: Refining your skills helps you get better at whatever you want to do.

source.title: Adult happy sportsman hitting ball with head
source.author: Yogendra Singh

meanings.definition: A tool or mechanical device used for special work.
examples: Airplanes have many instruments that help pilots fly.

images.alt: Photo of the instruments in an airplane cockpit
images.description: Instruments in an airplane cockpit. Some instruments show dials, others show numbers. There are many, many instruments shown in this picture.
images.caption: Instruments a pilot uses to fly an airplane.

meanings.definition: A tool or mechanical device used for special work.
examples: Airplanes have many gizmos that help pilots fly.

images.alt: Photo of the instruments in an airplane cockpit
images.description: Instruments in an airplane cockpit. Some instruments show dials, others show numbers. There are many, many instruments shown in this picture.
images.caption: Some of the gizmos a pilot uses to fly an airplane.

examples: The boat departed and moved away from the large ship.

images.alt: Photo of a small boat moving away from a larger ship.
images.description: A small boat is shown moving away from a larger ship.
images.caption: A smaller boat departing from a large ship.

source.title: High Angle View of People Sailing on Sea
source.author: Pixabay

examples: The boat embarked and moved away from the large ship.

images.alt: Photo of a small boat moving away from a larger ship.
images.description: A small boat is shown moving away from a larger ship.
images.caption: A smaller boat embarking from a large ship.

source.title: High Angle View of People Sailing on Sea
source.author: Pixabay

meanings.definition: The work a person chooses to do through life.
examples: She wants to have a career as a scientist.

images.alt: Photo of a doctor wearing a white lab coat.
images.description: Photo of a doctor wearing a white lab coat.
images.caption: This person has a career as a doctor.

meanings.definition: To make someone suddenly excited or very happy.
examples: I am thrilled to have a chance to go up in a hot air balloon!

images.alt: Photo of a with her hands up near her face and her mouth wide open.
images.description: A person with her mouth wide open and her hands on either side of her face. She looks excited.
images.caption: This person is thrilled about something!

meanings.definition: Used to introduce a negative phrase or clause, especially after a phrase using neither.
examples: He is neither honest nor trustworthy.

meanings.definition: To die by violence or in some other sudden way.
examples: Many people perished in the earthquake.

meanings.definition: Going or reaching across the Atlantic Ocean.
examples: We took a transatlantic flight from the U.S. to France.
